articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Indian cricketer Rishabh Pant wounded in car crash
articles.description: Pant is in a stable condition after his car collided with a divider and caught fire, according to police.
articles.content:
Indian cricketer Rishabh Pant has suffered multiple injuries in a car crash near the town of Roorkee in the Himalayan state of Uttarakhand, but is now in a stable condition, police have said.
Pant, … [+2318 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
